extendedInfo.description: A Christmas Tale Comes Alive in A Spectacular Interactive Storybook! Packed with coloring pages, puzzles and many more fantastic activities! A Revolutionary Reading Experience for Christmas & the Holiday Season!The Christmas Tale brings the joy of Christmas and the festivities of the holiday season together in a magnificent interactive story. Packed with gorgeous HD graphics and sound effects, young kids will experience Santa Claus, the elves, his sleigh and reindeer and the excitement of XMAS through a beautifully written story combined with engaging activities both children and their parents will love!Whatâs Inside Christmas Tale kids Storybook:â Make Music by tapping the Christmas Tree Ornamentâ Create a XMAS âWish Listâ and send it to Santa Claus or email it to a friend or relativeâ Kids learn to spell the words âtree,â âreindeer,â âsky,â âsnowmanâ& moreâ Take your time and try to find all the amazing interactions in each page yourself.â Improved menu system makes navigation easierâNEW exciting and educational games on each page of a Christmas Tale!â Jigsaw puzzles - Awesome puzzles enhance the story and promote critical thinking skillsâ Paint-a-Picture - Dozens of coloring pages and paintsâ Get crafty with your kids and share their masterpieces with friends!â Memory Match - Fire up your childâs memory skills with this smart activity!â Placement Puzzle - Place a character in their puzzle pieceâ Find the Item - Critical thinking skills and memory come together in this fun activityâ Memorize and Place - A great memory game that relates to the story and sharpens retentionThis charming Christmas Tale story brings the power of the Christmas spirit and the joy of giving, together in a fantastic and interactive story. Come meet Santa Claus and his wife at home in the North Pole as they prepare for Christmas. The XMAS countdown is on - and a âCountdownâ clock shows just how many days there are until XMAS. Listen to Santa Clausâs crackling fireplace that roars as a family of elves warms themselves in front of it. Play with the kids outside as they make snowballs and tap the snowman and see all of his cool outfits. Watch the kids dream about Santa Claus and Christmas morning. Join Santa Claus and his reindeer as he delivers presents to kids around the world.Christmas Tale kids Storybook Features:âFantastic HD illustrations covering all book pages.ââRead to Meâ will automatically read the story to youââRead it Myselfâ will allow you to control the reading yourself.ââAuto Playâ automatically reads the entire story to youâRecording Microphone that allows you to create your own dialogue for the charactersâEngage in numerous fun activities on every page and experience an interactive XMAS story!WE VALUE YOUR FEEDBACK:We always welcome your feedback, comments and suggestions- please take a minute to rateand review this app :) You can also contact us at: support@TabTale.comABOUT TabTale:Search âTabTaleâ on Google Play and discover more outstanding apps for young kids.TabTaleâs interactive storybooks provide an exciting and rich reading experience for manyof the most beloved children's stories. Filled with innovative and engaging activities, eachbook inspires young childrenâs creativity and imagination in a stimulating, enjoyable andinteractive way. More fantastic stories and games by TabTale LTD are coming soon. . .Join our Facebook Page: www.facebook.com/TabTaleFollow us on Twitter: @TabTaleWe do not support our coloring game on devices using the Ardeno GPU by Qualcomm yet. We are currently working on this issue and hope to have it resolved soon!By downloading this application you agree to the Terms of Use of TabTale Ltd. which are available to your review on http://tabtale.com/terms-of-use.NEED HELP?Contact us 24/7 with any questions or comments:support@TabTale.com
